page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: {St.Barnabus (C.of E.)}28 years old, has 150 seats. It is owned by the Diocese of Winchester. The roof is grey metal.Services are well attended. 37 children are involved in the Sunday School. They have 3 or 4 services on Sundays and 4, 5 or 6 in a week. St.Thomas More's, smallest of three Catholic Churches does not have a Sunday School because there is a R.C. primary school elsewhere in the city. The{Methodist Church}is 28 years old.50 people go to each service which last for one hour and are held twice a week.They have no bells or organ, instead they have a piano and a choir of 15 people. Churchgoers organize parties and outings for the children who go to the Sunday School. {St.Matthew's}is the very pretty old church at the original centre of {Weeke}near the village pond.
